puzzle.frontend

Class TileAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • BaseAdapter
      • puzzle.frontend.TileAdapter

  • public class TileAdapter
extends BaseAdapter
    Adapter that interacts with the graphical representation of the tiles, and the background processing.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  TileAdapter.Direction
      Used to simulate the solution movements.
